settings.text: Thank you for considering Premium Invention as your partner in security. We invite you to join us on this exciting journey into the future of security technology. Together, we can create a safer, more secure world for everyone.

settings.sub_info:
We offer more products privately. From 24/7 Wireless cameras to high-end wired cameras. They will be launching sometime this year but you could get your hands on them even sooner.

Contact us today to get more details: 800-224-0705. Open Mon-Fri 8:00 am to 4:00 pm PST.

settings.heading: Looking for a Custom Security Solution?

settings.text: We're gearing up to unveil a versatile range of security products that cater to diverse needs. Whether you're looking for round-the-clock wireless monitoring or robust wired solutions, we've got something that's just right for you.

For more details and an exclusive pre-launch offer, contact us today!
Phone: 877-224-0705
üïó Hours: Mon-Fri, 8:00 am - 4:00 pm PST

settings.title: Wireless Camera V4
settings.name: Kevin P.
settings.text:
Ease

Very easy to install and use. Footage is very clear and we love our purchase!

settings.title: Wired X3 Outdoor Camera
settings.name: Derek M.
settings.text:
Outstanding

Thanks for letting me be one of the first to review this product. I've tried many security cameras over the years and the X3 is easily among the best. It delivers crisp 4k visuals and its color night vision is a game-changer. Easy setup means you're up and running in minutes. The app is very easy to use and motion detection is pretty accurate. Highly recommend!

settings.title: Wireless Camera V3s
settings.name: David C.
settings.text:
Impressive

I‚Äôve purchased two 4/5G Cameras to cover two equestrian rings in remote fields. I am extremely pleased with both the camera quality and the picture quality. I would highly recommend and compare the output to cameras costing many thousands.
